pageTitle: Deputy Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, January 20, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Winnipeg, Manitoba

9:00 a.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will join the Prime Minister’s meeting with Premier of Manitoba, the Honourable Brian Pallister.

East Ballroom
Fairmont Winnipeg Hotel
2 Lombard Place

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 8:30 a.m. in the main lobby.

9:30 a.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will join the Prime Minister’s meeting with the Mayor of Winnipeg, Brian Bowman.

East Ballroom
Fairmont Winnipeg Hotel
2 Lombard Place

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:00 a.m. in the main lobby.

10:00 a.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Meeting.

Closed to media.

7:30 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will attend a Cabinet Retreat working dinner.

Closed to media.
